title: Hardik Patel quits Congress, takes aim at those ‘vacationing abroad’ - The Indian Express
content:
1. Hardik Patel quits Congress, takes aim at those ‘vacationing abroad’  The Indian Express
  2. 'Cong hates Gujaratis, focuses on Chicken sandwich': Hardik Patel quits party, attacks Rahul  Hindustan Times
  3. Hardik Patel Quits Congress, "Distracted By Phones" Dig At Rahul Gandhi  NDTV
  4. Rajdeep Sardesai Analyzes Hardik Patel's Exit From Congress & Its Impact Ahead Of Gujarat Elections  India Today
  5. No Hardik Feelings: One More From RaGa Gang Quits. Dog Pidi, Chicken Sandwich to Blame Again  News18
  6. View Full coverage on Google News
description: Hardik Patel quits Congress: "It is unfortunate that workers like us who travel 500-600 kilometres in our cars in a single day, get to see big leaders of Congress are far away from issues of Gujarat but are more focused on ensuring chicken sandwiches for leaders who have come from Delhi are delivered on time."
